common.pageTitle: EU Flood Monitoring System - Real Data Search
common.headerSubtitle: Real-time search for real flood data - from official weather APIs and social media

form.countryPlaceholder: Leave empty to query all countries
form.selectDateRange: Please select start date and end date
form.startDateAfterEnd: Start date cannot be later than end date
form.enterPageNumber: Please enter a page number between 1 and {max}

title.clickToViewDetails: Click on an event row in the table to view detailed information

hint.deepSearchHint: Click the button to perform deep search, generating impact assessment report and Table 2 data

title.queryRainEvents: ðŸ“… Query Rain Events (supports date range and country filter)

deepSearch.confirm:
Are you sure you want to perform deep search on event "{id}"?

This will:
1. Search related news and media content
2. Perform LLM analysis and validation
3. Generate impact assessment report
4. Create Table 2 data

This operation may take a few minutes.
deepSearch.confirmShort:
Are you sure you want to perform deep search on event "{id}"?

This will:
1. Search related news and official information
2. Use LLM to analyze impact
3. Generate detailed report
4. Fill Table 2 data

Estimated time: 30 seconds - 1 minute
deepSearch.completed: Deep search completed! Impact assessment report and Table 2 data have been generated.
deepSearch.requestFailed: Deep search request failed: Unable to get response
deepSearch.timeout: Deep search timeout (exceeded 4 minutes), please try again later

status.useSearchForm: Use the search form above to find real flood data
status.autoCollectTip: ðŸ’¡ Tip: The system automatically collects the latest data every 6 hours

error.openConsoleHint: ðŸ’¡ Tip: Open browser console (F12) to view full error information

select.pleaseSelectFile: Please select a data file first

thresholdMode.label: Threshold Mode
thresholdMode.hint: Grid mode uses NetCDF thresholds per point; fixed mode uses the value above

form.confirmDate: Confirm Date (can be manually modified, used for generating event ID)
form.dateHint: Default parsed from filename (e.g., 20251106), can be changed
form.thresholdSetting: Threshold Setting (default 50.0, can be modified; shows points with values greater than this threshold)
form.thresholdHint: Defaults to 50.0 if empty or invalid

action.filteringAndSavingInProgress: Filtering and saving, please wait (may take a few minutes)...
action.filterAndSaveCompleted: Filter and save completed! Added {count} entries

place.placeList: ðŸ“ Place List (Country/Province/City, by unique combination)
place.pointsDisplayed: {count} data points have been displayed on the map

query.title: ðŸ“ Query Rainfall Data by Address
query.description: Enter an address and date to find rainfall points within the NUTS3 region of that address
query.thresholdHint: ðŸ’¡ Default threshold for query: 50 (can be modified in threshold setting above)
query.addressHint: Enter city name or specific address
query.mapDisplayHint: Search successful, but map display needs further integration
query.noPointsFound: No rainfall points found matching the criteria
query.fileNotFound: No file found for date {date}. Please upload the file first.
query.addressNotFound: Address not found. Please provide a more specific address.
query.nuts3NotFound: Failed to find NUTS3 region for the given location

dashboard.welcome: Welcome to EU Flood Monitoring System
dashboard.description: Use the global query function on the left to query rainfall events, then view and analyze data on various pages.

hint.useGlobalQuery: ðŸ’¡ Tip: Use the global query function on the left to query events, results will be displayed on this page.
hint.noData: ðŸ“­ No event data found matching the criteria

analysis.description: This page will provide data statistics, trend analysis, regional comparison and other functions.

management.description: This page will provide data source management, data synchronization status, data quality monitoring and other functions.

referenceSites.title: Reference Websites
referenceSites.subtitle: Official websites related to rainfall and flood monitoring that we reference

copernicus.name: Copernicus Emergency Management Service
copernicus.description: EU Copernicus Emergency Management Service providing rapid mapping and situational reporting for floods, fires and other disasters

efas.name: European Flood Awareness System (EFAS)
efas.description: European Flood Awareness System providing flood warnings and forecasts across Europe

gfms.name: Global Flood Monitoring System (GFMS)
gfms.description: Real-time flood detection and monitoring system using satellite data

nasaGpm.name: NASA Global Precipitation Measurement (GPM)
nasaGpm.description: NASA Global Precipitation Measurement mission providing global rainfall and snowfall data

wmo.name: World Meteorological Organization (WMO)
wmo.description: World Meteorological Organization providing global meteorological data and flood forecasting information

youtube.name: YouTube
youtube.description: Video platform containing extensive flood-related news reports and real-time information

map.geojsonLoaded: GeoJSON region loaded (hover to view NUTS information)
